eventDecorators.name: CacheTotalSupplyInitiated
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. This event will be emitted every time the implementation gets upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: TxToL2
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. This event will be emitted every time the implementation gets upgraded.

functionDecorators.name: cacheTotalSupply
functionDecorators.description: Executes a L2 call to cache L1 LPT total supply in L2LPTDataCache.

parameterDecorators.name: _gasPriceBid
parameterDecorators.description: Gas price bid for L2 execution.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxSubmissionCost
parameterDecorators.description: Max ETH to pay for retryable ticket base submission fee.

functionDecorators.name: getCacheTotalSupplyData
functionDecorators.description: Return L2 calldata and total supply to use for a L2 call on L2LPTDataCache.
